Description:
Excellence in prized Yarra edge pocket
Impressive space, sensational style, two outdoor domains and a brilliant city edge position. Each one a prized property element in its own right but this fabulous two bedroom apartment delivers all creating an exceptional first home or investment offering at Clifton Hill's fashionable Yarra end. Beautifully quiet on the second floor of a boutique block, a preferred northern aspect ensures brilliant natural light and blue sky aspects illuminate generous living/ dining zones that include a chic semi integrated stone kitchen and broad undercover entertaining terrace. Two double bedrooms, each with BIRs enjoy their own zone with a fully tiled bathroom, one with sole access to a totally private open air terrace boasting dynamic views to the CBD skyline. Further advantages include quality Blanco appliances and dishwasher, intercom security, lift access, storage cage and parking. Walk to Clifton Hill Village, Yarra Bend parklands, city bike trails and Dights Falls, minutes to Fitzroy, Collingwood and Abbotsford bars and nightlife venues, transport options and more.
Insights: 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
A STUNNING SETTING FOR YOUR FAMILY'S FUTURE
Refined family living meets modern convenience with this magnificently updated Victorian boasting supreme positioning moments to verdant Edinburgh Gardens, Darling Gardens, Queens Parade shopping & multiple transport options. Splendid period features - soaring ceilings, ornamental fireplaces, decorative mouldings, chandeliers & ceiling roses - exude a stately elegance, whilst polished floors & modern glass doors & windows inject a welcoming sense of light & space through 2 robed bedrooms, study (possible 3rd BR), sparkling central bath & a sun-kissed living, dining & contemporary kitchen featuring stone bench tops. Wander through to an easy care courtyard & covered entertaining deck exhibiting gorgeous northerly aspects, introducing a light filled bungalow beyond comprising yet another bedroom with ensuite, which would be perfect for additional guest accommodation or ideal home office. With central heating/cooling & secure video entry, this immaculate home is in the coveted Gold St Primary catchment & a short stroll to fantastic amenities in all directions.
Insights: 60A Hodgkinson Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
One of a kind...
This stunning one off town residence offers luxurious accommodation, beautiful finish and fabulous northerly orientation. Ground floor, a bedroom, bathroom, and a lock up garage, laundry and powder room. First floor, open plan living/dining and a wraparound deck and a top floor master suite with ensuite bathroom, wir and terrace. No body corporate, a quiet cul de sac position and central location make this property a must to inspect.
www.sherbrookeconstructions.com.au

Description:
Affordable Inner City Style
This stylish, contemporary apartment is positioned perfectly in the heart of Clifton Hill. Close to Queens Parade shopping, Darling Gardens, Collingwood Leisure Centre and Clifton Hill Station it offers a great opportunity to step into the property market in the booming inner north. Larger than many similar apartments (48 sqm approx. plus balcony), offering good-sized kitchen with modern appliances, living/dining flowing through to a full-width balcony, one double bedroom (BIRs), fully-tiled bathroom with concealed laundry, plus secure carspace, intercom entry and split-system air conditioning.
Hamish Lindsay : 0477 435 740

Description:
Style, Quality & A Darling Gardens Cul-de-sac
A stylish contemporary transformation will see you instantly loving the lifestyle with this outstanding three bedroom residence enjoying a coveted cul-de-sac setting just metres to Darling Gardens. Both inside and out, upstairs and down; the emphasis of this impressive inner-city Victorian is on consummate quality that's brilliantly executed for secluded easy living and alfresco entertaining. Just a hop, skip and jump to school, Queens Parade cafes, trams and train station; the exceptional layout of this superb home offers arched hallway, 2nd-level parents' retreat with ensuite, smart living and dining with French doors to entertainment deck, brilliant stone kitchen with dual-drawer dishwasher, two bathrooms, separate WC, European laundry, central heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, alarm system, polished floorboards, marble OFP, plantation shutters, great storage and rear roller door access.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978
Insights: 11 Page Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
First home buyers, investors or down-sizers, this can't be missed!!!!!
Located in a great location with easy access to the Eastern Freeway and Melbourne CBD, this ground floor apartment has plenty of potential and a gorgeous view into the common garden.
With a great community atmosphere, where you can meet your neighbour for a BBQ or just simply entertain your guests; while only being a short walk to the Merri Creek Trail and Yarra Bench Park for anyone who loves greenery and enjoys the buzz of the city life.
With 2 bedrooms and BIRs, 1 bathroom and laundry facilities, this apartment provides all you need in clever designs. DON'T MISS THE OPEN ON SATURDAY OR YOU COULD MISS OUT COMPLETELY!

Description:
Delightful Village Victorian with second street frontage
Long-held 'Linden' is the ideal choice for those on the lookout for a prime Clifton Hill village position including north-facing rear garden and second frontage to Rose Street. This delightful solid brick Victorian was last secured in the 60s and having evolved to meet changing needs now waits for new owners to further improve on its completely comfortable 2-level layout. At the wide end of the street moments to Merri Trail cycling, cafes, schools and train station; this attractive home presents an outstanding inner-city opportunity offering 3 sizable bedrooms, arched hallway, flowing living and dining room, generous kitchen, large non-slip floor bathroom, laundry area, gas space heating, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, sunny courtyard garden, workshop and remote-control garage.

Description:
Appealing 3BR Edwardian, Top Address
On an elevated corner block, this attractive double-fronted residence offers immaculately presented living with scope for further improvement. Within easy walking distance to Queens Parade, Brunswick Street, the Darling Gardens and Gold Street Primary, it comprises three double bedrooms (two with BIRs), updated kitchen open to a north-facing living and dining room, and bathroom/laundry with separate WC. Flowing to the rear are a sunny pergola-covered patio and courtyard with secure off-street parking from Hilton Street. In a tightly-held corner of Clifton Hill, just 10 minutes from the CBD, this classic period home features Deco plaster detail, strapped ceilings and split-system air conditioning.
Insights: 48 Council Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfectly designed park-edge living
This immaculate town residence on its own title and without an owners-corporation offers superbly zoned low-maintenance living bordering 260 ha Yarra Bend Park and Dight's Falls, and close to Village shops, cafes, restaurants, schools and all public transport. Filled with light, its spacious dining/informal living area flows to a tranquil north-facing landscaped garden with off-street parking. This captivating home incorporates a light-filled sitting room overlooking the front garden, well-equipped kitchen with pantry and generous storage, 2 good-sized double bedrooms (BIRs), and a stylish new bathroom/laundry (over bath shower and separate WC). Just 15 minutes from the CBD, this inviting residence features ample storage, bespoke bike shed, drip watering system, timber floors, split-system air conditioning, panel heating and premium fittings.
Insights: 193 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning Four Level Town Home!
Recently constructed emphasising a modern & contemporary design, enjoy the flexible floor plan, boasting generous accommodation with superb quality fixtures and fittings throughout. Nestled in a highly regarded inner city pocket this larger than usual town home is sure to impress. Comprises:
Ground floor
Double garage & light well
First floor
Two double bedrooms with B.I.R's
Master bedroom includes stunning ensuite bathroom
Spacious central bathroom
Second floor
Quality Chefs choice kitchen with smeg appliances, vast open plan family living area to private sunny terrace, ideal for the entertainer.
Third floor
Second master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, W.I.R & large sunny terrace.
Added attractions include
Alarm system, solid timber floors, open tread stair cases, quality carpets, European laundry, solar hot water, mirrored B.I.R's & stone bench tops.
Take a leisurely stroll to Darling gardens & Cliffton Hill station, whilst a little further along you will find Queens Parade shopping precinct, Collingwood leisure centre, Mayors Park to Merri Creek trail and exciting Smith & Brunswick Streets.
Insights: 21/184 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern living in tightly held cul-de-sac
An air of exclusivity surrounds this outstanding contemporary townhouse tucked away in a highly sought-after cul-de-sac enclave nestled at the heart of the delightful Clifton Hill Village. Superbly designed stylishly blending form and function for fabulous low-maintenance living, privacy and peace are immediately evident with this wonderful home seamlessly integrating leafy courtyard garden and dining area while the living room flows to the alfresco entertainment deck. The two-level layout also offers two double bedrooms with built-in-robes, large study area & kitchen, bright bathroom, European laundry and garage. Features include heating/cooling, polished hardwood floors and storage. Conveniently located near train, cafes, shops and vast parkland.

Description:
Spacious Apartment Opposite Parkland
Enjoying one of Clifton Hill's most highly sought-after parkland positions, this smart 2nd-floor apartment with an exceptional address is brimming with lifestyle bonuses featuring parkland views and garage. Quietly and privately nestled in the coveted 'Clifton View Apartments', this brilliant investment and affordable low-maintenance home presents a wonderful inner-city lifestyle opportunity. With tranquil Merri Creek parks and trails at your doorstep, cafes, Queens Parade and Clifton Hill Train Station nearby, this irresistible apartment offers 2 double bedrooms with built-in robes, large living room, huge kitchen/dining, bathroom, separate powder room, laundry taps, heating and secure intercom entry.

Description:
Idyllic Location with Parkland Views…
Beautifully presented and quite sizeable this contemporary (Circa 1995) three level home enjoys a location opposite Ramsden Street Reserve with delightful Yarra River environs, kilometres of bike/walking tracks and acres of picturesque parkland literally at your front door. The sublime city-edge location also doesn’t want for quality eateries, speciality shopping, public transport and renowned schooling as all are close at hand making this an ideal lifestyle opportunity offering the best of all worlds…
Individually titled and not part of an owner’s corporation this semi-detached Georgian inspired residence comprises 3 generously proportioned bedrooms each with access to their own bathroom, formal lounge, free flowing open plan living/dining, central kitchen with stone benchtops, separate laundry, study nook and 4 toilets.
Features include gas heating, split system air conditioning, Smeg appliances, dishwasher, an abundance of internal/external storage, north facing windows to each of the bedrooms, low maintenance front & rear courtyards and remote rear access to a single carport.
Simply outstanding!
ESTIMATED SALE RANGE
Our estimated sale range of between $1,070,000 and $1,170,000 is based on local comparable sales and represents a true and accurate indication of where a sale may be transacted either on the day of auction or negotiated beforehand.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Refined inner city living
Ideally located, this elevated Victorian Terrace is just moments from Queen's parade shops, Edinburgh Gardens and has easy access to the CBD. Refurbished throughout, with beautiful original period detail, the light filled accommodation includes three bedrooms and there is a separate living room at the front which could also be a fourth bedroom. The open plan living overlooks a functional kitchen with European appliances, marble benchtops and opens to a leafy courtyard garden. There is a well fitted laundry off the kitchen with a second toilet. The location is ideal - with amenity around every corner and you are located in the coveted school zone for Gold St Primary School. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Style Space and Security
A brilliant first home or great addition to your investment portfolio, tucked away in a popular little pocket of Clifton Hill, is this well presented one bedroom apartment, offering space, style and security. Modern and bright with city views, comprising open plan living with meals area, private balcony, fully equip kitchen with SS appliances, gas cooking and dishwasher plus a tiled bathroom with combined laundry facilities. Additional features include split system heating / cooling, video intercom and security entrance, remote lock up garage and secure storage unit. Situated near Spensley St Village, Dights falls, Queens Parade shopping strip, schools, transport and so much more.
Agent - hockingstuart
Amanda Murphy : 0414 352 291

Description:
Where Barries meets Harrys
Rothe Lowman designed perfectly caters for executive living with modern, stylish interiors that are defined by their bright airiness and a corner block position that captures light from every aspect.
The first floor is dedicated to sun-soaked living where a central kitchen and living and dining spaces are lined with windows and open to two balconies. Equipped with polished floorboards, Miele appliances, stone-topped benches, and multiple split systems, this living zone is sure to impress.
The three bedrooms (BIRs) each come with a stylish en suite; the ground floor bedroom also has its own street entry.
An auto SLUG with storage & internal access and a Euro laundry bring easy-living convenience.
Professionals or investors will see the value of this exceptional inner-city location on a parkside fringe within easy reach of the station, cafes and shops.

Description:
Large & Light In A Desirable Lifestyle Location
Sensational space, security and loads of uplifting natural light are at the essence of this brilliant warehouse apartment offering exceptional single-level living and entertaining. Standing independently to the rear of a coveted warehouse complex, remote-control gate access to two car spaces precedes this superbly proportioned, first-floor home with own separate entrance and huge storeroom. Just a short stroll to cafes, train station and the Merri Creek and Main Yarra Trails. This stunning modern apartment comprises two large bedrooms (built-in-robes; main includes ensuite), impressive living and dining area with full-height sliding doors to a spacious north-facing alfresco terrace, massive stone kitchen with European appliances, two bathrooms, laundry, heating/cooling, alarm system, video intercom, new carpets and polished hardwood floors.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
Spacious entertainer in prime position
This town residence presents effortless light-filled modern living with inspiring views and a versatile floorplan. A first-floor living zone is designed to impress with two outdoor terraces that create an indoor-outdoor living experience. Beautifully finished interiors include a marble island bench with waterfall edges and white 2pac cabinetry that perfectly offset stunning Japanned floorboards. A private alfresco terrace makes for an exceptional entertainment domain. The black floors give way to grey carpet in the three upstairs bedrooms, and the two stylish bathrooms are fully tiled with stone-topped vanities. A ground-floor rumpus/4th bedroom could also suit a home office with an impressive entry foyer. The auto tandem garage with polished concrete floors and internal access provides even more scope. Extra features: video intercom, ducted heating, R/C cooling, 2 additional powder rooms. Steps from the village shops, cafes, parks and the train station, spacious and modern executive living never looked so good. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 3 other 3 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious & Secure Indoor-Outdoor Sanctuary
Secluded and sun-drenched alfresco areas complement the large proportioned interior spaces of this outstanding multi-level residence set privately to the rear of a boutique inner-city complex. An exceptional low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity secured by remote-control gate access, video intercom and double garage with internal entry; indoor-outdoor enjoyment of this quality-appointed home is enhanced by its enviable location by Yarra River trails/parkland, village cafes, shops and schools and 10 minute train trip to the CBD. This spacious modern townhouse features three big bedrooms (built-in-robes; main with ensuite and separate terrace), huge living and dining zone with bifold doors to solid granite paved entertainment terrace, excellent stone kitchen (Smeg appliances, dual-drawer dishwasher), two bathrooms, laundry, hydronic heating, air-conditioning, CAT5 cabling and polished hardwood floors.

Description:
Ripe For Renovation…
The cherished family home of the Jennings family since the mid 1940’s this brick clad weatherboard cottage is awaiting a new chapter in its history and is certainly ready for a significant renovation or rebuild in accordance with your imagination, budget and relevant council approval. Blessed with a rear northerly aspect, substantial allotment of some 163sqm (Approx) and rear right of way this is an all too rare opportunity to transform an honest and well-loved home into a rejuvenated inner city abode.
Currently the home is basic, without pretence and with floors that slope and sag however it’s comfortable to live in or lease out whilst you contemplate the renovation/rebuild of your mind’s eye and gain permits to do so. With a somewhat flexible floor plan the cottage features 2 bedrooms, lounge, separate dining, galley kitchen, bathroom with toilet, laundry, sizeable rear yard, gas space heater and air conditioning.
Clifton Hill’s most affordable home!
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Wide and Elevated
This freestanding Edwardian residence on a large 220 sqm allotment combines picture-book period appeal, light-filled contemporary style and a prime address close to Yarra parkland, primary schools and CBD transport. Elevated from the street, here is a captivating home offering 2 double bedrooms with quality BIRs, an ultra spacious living and dining room with french doors, a glass encased entertainer's kitchen and/meals area (including premium appliances and, stone benchtops) with streams of northerly light, a stylishly refitted bathroom with dual walk-in shower, plus separate laundry. The sunny north facing courtyard, with garden storage/2nd WC and potential car access via rear right-of-way, forms a welcoming backdrop to this immaculate home featuring polished Baltic floors, OFPs and other period detail, ducted heating and refrigerated air conditioning.
Insights: 133 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
